description: What maintaining, selling, storing, and manufacturing policy should the company pursue in order to maximize profit? The company has M machines, each with a specific downtime Downtime. There are K products, each with an associated profit Profit and a production time on each machine given by Time. Products must adhere to limits given by Limit. The price for storing products is StorePrice, and they must keep a quantity of KeepQuantity in the store. The company has WorkHours work hours available for all machines combined.
